name: zodiacal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to an area of the sky through which the sun, moon, and most of the planets appear to move, divided into twelve equal parts, each with a name and symbol, and each connected with an exact time of year: She was born under the zodiacal sign of Cancer. Leo is one of the brightest of the zodiacal constellations. See
zodiac
More examplesFewer examplesA system of 12 equal zodiacal divisions did not exist until circa 450 BCE.This pyramid of light is called the "zodiacal light" because it lines up along the constellations of the zodiac.The symbols for all the planets are entered according to the zodiacal sign they occupied on this birth date.
